column5: Key informationThis programme enables you to come up with safe solutions for real-world projects. You’ll learn in small groups alongside world-leading engineers using high-end industry software. This MSc will give you the opportunity to develop your own area of structural engineering expertise and the opportunity to work worldwide.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years (up to 28 months) part time
